trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 인증 된 정보는 콜백 메서드를 제공 때는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged"> </xref> 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: 피어의 현재 상태 발생 한 변경 유형을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> object containing data that specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref>현재 상태는 피어를 하기 위해 수행 된 변경의 유형을 지정 하는 데이터를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> 에 현재 상태 정보가 변경 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> specified by <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> is not associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, this value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>에 지정 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A>연관 되지 않은 한 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>,이 값은 `null`.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>와 연결 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 에 현재 상태 정보가 변경 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 에 현재 상태 정보가 변경 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.

Specifies the changed presence information of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> as well as a string provided by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: 변경 된 현재 상태 정보를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 에서 제공 하는 문자열 및 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"> </xref> 업데이트 된 현재 상태를 설명 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Changed presence information for <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> and a string describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 현재 상태 정보를 변경 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 및 업데이트 된 현재 상태를 설명 하는 문자열입니다.
